newsArray.title: Ashes Scout: Legend warns Poms to ditch ‘daft cricket’, bolter to break 136-year England record, Sam’s mental ‘demons’
creator: The Roar
newsArray.description: England legend Geoff Boycott has warned Brendon McCullum’s Ashes hopefuls to ditch their “daft attacking cricket” and told them they don’t need to play like the “Harlem Globetrotters” to beat Australia this summer. A steadfast and cautious opener, Boycott has carved a niche as a pundit with no patience for frills or frivilous cricket. He [...]
